import React from "react"; import "./dropdown-languages-card.styles.css"; const LanguageCard = ({ show }) => { return (
Change Language
English - EN
Español - ES
简体中文 - ZH
Deutsch - DE
Português - PT
繁體中文 - ZH/span/
한국어 - KO
עברית - HE
اللغة العربية - AR
); }; export default LanguageCard;
